DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 3 study evaluates safety , immunogenicity lot-to lot consistency 3 lot aH5N1c vaccine pandemic avian influenza , approximately 2394 healthy adult ≥18 year age receive vaccine 798 healthy adult receive placebo . Subjects randomize 3:1 ratio receive either aH5N1c vaccine saline placebo . Enrollment stratify age : 18 < 65 year age ≥65 year age , allow adequate safety assessment entire age spectrum .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety , Immunogenicity , Lot-to-Lot Consistency H5N1 Subunit Influenza Virus Vaccine Healthy Adult Subjects ≥18 Years Age

Individuals pregnant breastfeeding . Female subject childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test prior study vaccine administer . Females childbearing potential refuse use acceptable method birth control Day 1 ( 1st vaccination ) 3 week second study vaccination , , sexually active , use reliable birth control method least two month prior study entry . Individuals receive type influenza vaccine ( e.g. , `` seasonal '' ) within 7 day prior enrolment study plan receive type influenza vaccine within 7 day ( ) study vaccine .
